name: engageSPARK Limited
description: Developer of a mobile engagement platform designed to leverage the power of automation and workflows via phone calls, messaging and chat. The company's mobile engagement platform helps to create phone surveys, pre-recorded messages, interactive telephone services, automatic replies in audio or text and more, enabling companies to reach their clients and audiences through phone and SMS campaigns.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile engagement platform designed to leverage the power of automation and workflows via phone calls, messaging and chat. The company's mobile engagement platform helps to create phone surveys, pre-recorded messages, interactive telephone services, automatic replies in audio or text and more, enabling companies to reach their clients and audiences through phone and SMS campaigns.
